TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OracleException extends System.Data.Common.DbException
Public NotInheritable Class OracleException Inherits DbException
public ref class OracleException sealed : System::Data::Common::DbException

summary.span: 例外狀況，當 Oracle 資料庫或 .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 傳回警告或錯誤時所產生。

span.span: The exception that is generated when a warning or error is returned by an Oracle database or the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別建立每當遇到無法處理的情況。This class is created whenever the encounters a situation that it cannot handle. 如果發生嚴重錯誤，伺服器可能會關閉 。If the severity of the error is too great, the server may close the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下列範例會產生因遺失的資料庫，然後顯示例外狀況。The following example generates an due to a missing database, and then displays the exception. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleException/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleException/VB/source.vb#1)]
